page.title: 14Brookfield School
page.content:
{The Past
Brookfields history is one of change, ranging from those times in 1931 when the Granparents of the present students can recall it's fermal opening as 'Sarisbury Senior School'. 1981 was the schools's Golden Jubilee.
Sinse these times the school has been dramatically enlarged by attractive, purpose built acccomodation including a Sports-hall ,excellent practical facilities and pleasing academic study areas,There are currently 1,229 pupils attending the school. The expected numbers for years to come are increasing rapidly.
